description:
default configuration option "allow_migrate_to_same_host" from nova.conf is no longer used. Add this to deprecated options for OpenStack compute.  

Detailed information can be found at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1364851

doc source: openstack-manuals/doc/config-reference/source/tables/conf-changes/nova.rst
title: Add  'allow_migrate_to_same_host' in deprecated options for nova.conf

comments.content:
default configuration option "allow_migrate_to_same_host" from nova.conf is no longer used. Add this to deprecated options for OpenStack compute.  

Detailed information can be found at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1364851

doc source: openstack-manuals/doc/config-reference/source/tables/conf-changes/nova.rst

comments.content:
commit details from OpenStack-nova where this config options is removed.
https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/49cec4c74ff2631d5ec39761ab0308bdf8e774da

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Lana Brindley (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/292486
Reason: This is an autogenerated file, the change needs to be made in the Nova repo instead.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: Marking as Won't Fix. This needs to be updated in the nova repo, and not the docs repo. So that the files can be updated with the auto-config tool.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alexandra-settle

comments.content: This option was removed in the Liberty 12.0.0 release (without a deprecation period admittedly). The only way to get this back into nova.conf right now is to register the option but mark it deprecated, even though it's not even used in the code, which doesn't make sense at this point for something that was removed in Liberty (and Liberty is EOL now). So I've marked this as Won't Fix also for Nova.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
